title: 111_s3719
content: The "Strengthening Community Safety Act of 2010" is also known as the First Responder Agency Grants under the Homeland Security Act of 2002. This act provides assistance to first responder agencies. The "Strengthening Community Safety Act of 2010" defines terms related to first responder agencies, including active duty, eligible first responder agency, and first responder agency. The "Strengthening Community Safety Act of 2010" defines terms related to first responder agencies, including active duty, eligible first responder agency, and first responder agency. The act authorizes the Administrator to make grants to eligible first responder agencies for additional costs incurred when employees who are reservists are placed on active duty. Reservists are defined as members of a reserve component of the Armed Forces. The Administrator may not grant funds for costs related to an employee on active duty if Federal funds are used for their pay or benefits. The grant can be used for hiring replacements, overtime expenses, and equipment costs for eligible first responder agencies. The Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency may provide grants for costs related to replacing employees on active duty for a period of 6 months. A report evaluating the impact of placing first responder agency employees who are reservists on active duty must be submitted to Congress within 2 years of the enactment of this Act. The impact of placing first responder agency employees who are reservists on active duty, including financial effects and grants under section 2041 of the Homeland Security Act of 2002, must be evaluated. This evaluation should consider the effects on the operation and services provided by the first responder agencies to the communities they serve. The Homeland Security Act of 2002 is amended to evaluate the impact of placing first responder agency employees who are reservists on active duty. This evaluation should consider the effects on the operation and services provided by the first responder agencies to the communities they serve. Additionally, a technical and conforming amendment is made to the table of contents in the Act. Subtitle C--Other Assistance: Sec. 2041. First responder agency grants.
